definition: a plaything consisting of a board balanced on a fulcrum, move unsteadily, with a rocking motion
details:
noun
- a plaything consisting of a board balanced on a fulcrum
= synonyms: teeter, teeter-totter, teetertotter, teeterboard, tilting board, dandle board
verb
- move unsteadily, with a rocking motion
= synonyms: teeter, totter
- move up and down as if on a seesaw
- ride on a plank
= synonyms: teeter-totter, teetertotter
